title: Traditional Greetings
description: Learn about proper greeting etiquette in Algerian culture
descriptionArabic: تعلم آداب التحية المناسبة في الثقافة الجزائرية
descriptionAmazigh: Lmed ɣef ilugan n usulem deg tdelsant tazayrit
question: What is the most appropriate response when someone says 'السلام عليكم' (As-salamu alaykum)?
questionArabic: ما هو الرد الأنسب عندما يقول شخص 'السلام عليكم'؟
questionAmazigh: D acu-t urray ifazen mi ara d-yini yiwen 'As-salamu alaykum'?

options.explanation: While friendly, this doesn't follow traditional Islamic greeting protocol
This is the traditional and proper response to the Islamic greeting
This is a time-specific greeting, not the proper response
This is not the appropriate response to a greeting

explanation: In Islamic culture, when someone greets you with 'السلام عليكم' (Peace be upon you), the proper response is 'وعليكم السلام' (And upon you peace). This maintains the traditional greeting exchange.
explanationArabic: في الثقافة الإسلامية، عندما يحييك شخص بـ 'السلام عليكم'، الرد المناسب هو 'وعليكم السلام'. هذا يحافظ على تبادل التحية التقليدية
explanationAmazigh: Deg tdelsant n Islam, mi ara ak-d-yislem yiwen s 'As-salamu alaykum', urray ifazen d 'Wa alaykum as-salam'. Aya yettḥeṛṛes asmenyif n usulem amaziɣ

title: Tea Ceremony Etiquette
description: Understanding the cultural significance of tea serving in Algeria
descriptionArabic: فهم الأهمية الثقافية لتقديم الشاي في الجزائر
descriptionAmazigh: Aqader n wazal adelsani n uqeddim n atay deg Lezzayer
question: You're visiting an Algerian family and they offer you tea. What should you do?
questionArabic: أنت تزور عائلة جزائرية وقدموا لك الشاي. ماذا يجب أن تفعل؟
questionAmazigh: Tetterzuḍ tawacult tazayrit, fkan-ak atay. D acu ara txedmeḍ?

options.text: Politely decline if you don't want tea
options.textArabic: ارفض بأدب إذا كنت لا تريد الشاي
options.textAmazigh: Agi s nnif ma yella ur tebɣiḍ ara atay
options.explanation: Declining tea can be seen as impolite in Algerian hospitality culture

options.text: Accept graciously, even if just a small sip
options.textArabic: اقبل بامتنان، حتى لو كانت رشفة صغيرة فقط
options.textAmazigh: Qbel s ufrah, ula ma d taqecwalt meẓẓiyen kan
options.explanation: Accepting tea shows respect for the host's hospitality, a core value in Algerian culture
This could be seen as rejecting their hospitality gesture

options.text: Wait for them to drink first
options.textAmazigh: Raǧu alamma d nutni ara yeswen zdat
options.explanation: Guests are typically served and expected to drink first as a sign of honor

explanation: In Algerian culture, offering tea is a fundamental gesture of hospitality. Accepting it, even if you only take a small sip, shows respect and appreciation for your host's kindness.
explanationArabic: في الثقافة الجزائرية، تقديم الشاي هو إيماءة أساسية للضيافة. قبوله، حتى لو أخذت رشفة صغيرة فقط، يظهر الاحترام والتقدير لكرم المضيف
explanationAmazigh: Deg tdelsant tazayrit, aqeddim n atay d tamawt tazadurt n uqbal. Aqbal-is, ula ma teswiḍ taqecwalt meẓẓiyen kan, yesken-d aqader d ufrah i nnif n bab n wexxam

title: Wedding Traditions
description: Test your knowledge of Algerian wedding customs
descriptionAmazigh: Sekyed tamusni-inek ɣef iẓuran n tmeɣra tazayrit
question: What is the traditional Algerian wedding celebration called that lasts several days?
questionArabic: ما اسم احتفال الزفاف الجزائري التقليدي الذي يستمر عدة أيام؟
questionAmazigh: D acu isem n tmeɣra n tmeɣra tazayrit taẓurant i yettdumun ddeqs n wussan?
explanation: The traditional Algerian wedding celebration is called 'العرس' (Al-Urs) in Arabic or 'Tameɣra' in Amazigh. It typically involves multiple days of festivities with different ceremonies, music, traditional clothing, and elaborate feasts.
explanationArabic: يُسمى احتفال الزفاف الجزائري التقليدي 'العرس' بالعربية أو 'تامغرا' بالأمازيغية. يتضمن عادة عدة أيام من الاحتفالات مع مراسم مختلفة وموسيقى وملابس تقليدية ووجبات فاخرة
explanationAmazigh: Tameɣra tazayrit taẓurant tettwasem 'Al-Urs' s taεrabt neɣ 'Tameɣra' s tamaziɣt. Tettawi-d aṭas n wussan n tmeɣriwin s yinaḍen imgaraden, aẓawan, tiksiwin tiẓuranin d imensi imeqqranen
